name: Gun'n Ghouls
description:
Fast paced first person bullet hell.

Use advanced movement options to traverse treacherous terrain and avoid the never ending attacks from your enemies.

Demon Lord Zjahti has ruled Bullet Hell with an iron fist for eons, that was until he was murdered. Demon lords don't die very easily though. Reverted to an infantile form, Zjahti would spend his days just below purgatory in Bullet hell, a place for souls that cannot perish, but cannot escape either. 

Never one to sit idle however, Zjahti escapes his cage with a weapon in hand, dead set on reviving.
